column1: Uchi////But some of the elements include pretentiousness and a bit of grandeur (I literally asked why my Bacon Tataki came in a huge white pate that was clearly too big. Was told
column2: "it's for negative space" WTF if I wanted to look at negative space I would look at my bank account after a bad weekend in Vegas....). Moreover
column3: let's remember this is Houston not NYC or LA.
